title: Lightning Elements
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 10 Lightning sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.


Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/jh3RxgYr0Jk


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 30 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● Lightning 01_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Lightning 02_#[512,288].png 2048x1344

● Lightning 03_#[512,288].png 2048x1613

● Lightning 04_#[512,288].png 2048x1536

● Lightning 05_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Lightning 06_#[512,288].png 2048x1613

● Lightning 07_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Lightning 08_#[512,288].png 2048x1382

● Lightning 09_#[512,288].png 2048x1382

● Lightning 10_#[512,288].png 2048x1536


Number of Textures: 10

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
